paper_abstract: A (4,6) fullerene graph is a 3-regular planar graph which faces are squares or hexagons. In this paper, we first compute the number of paths of low order in a fullerene. Then apply these numbers to obtain the number of independent sets and k-matchings in fullerenes, when k = 1, 2, 3, 4.
paper_title: On the Number of Paths, Independent Sets, and Matchings of Low Order in (4,6)-Fullerenes
